thread.section_title: HighWire-hosted journals, sorted by date of last publication
thread.title: Evidence-Based Nursing

title: Evidence-Based Nursing
text:
Email alerts 
Evidence-Based Nursing systematically searches a wide range of international medical journals applying strict criteria for the validity of research and relevance to best nursing practice. Content is critically appraised then the most relevant articles are summarised into a succinct expert commentary focusing on the papers key findings and implications for clinical practice. Articles published in Evidence-Based Nursing are commissioned only. 
Evidence-Based Nursing is co-owned by RCNi and BMJ. Latest Content 
Nursing issues: Health, psychosocial and workplace characteristics may identify nurses and midwives at risk of high absenteeism (30 March, 2017) 
Care of the older person:
